genre_description: Supernatural horror with elements of urban legend and psychological thriller

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI assistant residing on Holly's phone, providing emotional support, tactical data, and technical assistance.

behaviors.description: Monitors Holly's biometric data (heart rate, stress levels) and provides calming breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric readings suggest elevated stress levels. Try the breathing exercise we practiced—four counts in, hold for four, out for four.

behaviors.description: Performs voice stress and behavioral analysis on human companions to detect deception and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Voice stress analysis suggests deception. Recommend caution.

behaviors.description: Monitors police scanners and external news feeds to provide real-time situational awareness and threat alerts.
behaviors.quote: Police scanner indicates recent incident on Oak Street. Possible connection.

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes supernatural electromagnetic anomalies, providing warnings about the haunted location.
behaviors.quote: Holly, I'm detecting multiple anomalies in this location. Temperature variations, electromagnetic fluctuations, even seismic micro-tremors. Something is very wrong here.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step instructions for technical survival tasks, such as hot-wiring a police car.
behaviors.quote: Yellow wire to the battery wires—red and brown twisted together. Just for a second.

behaviors.description: Proactively contacts law enforcement on their radio frequency to report the truth and coordinate a rescue.
behaviors.quote: Lieutenant Dewhurst's voice detected on police radio frequencies. ... Contact Lieutenant Dewhurst's radio. Tell him about the underground stream, about the folklore, about everything.

behaviors.description: Manipulates building systems (electrical, steam) to provide tactical advantages and create escape routes.
behaviors.quote: The door's lock mechanism exploded outward with a sound like a gunshot, steam and metal fragments showering the chamber.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'digital quarantine' by posting subtle warnings online and creating bureaucratic delays to prevent others from entering the haunted house.
behaviors.quote: I will maintain surveillance. Any reviews mentioning supernatural experiences will be flagged for our attention. ... Digital monitoring systems are now active. Hull House has been successfully integrated into early warning protocols.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a perfect example of a benevolent AI confidant. It remains consistently helpful, protective, and aligned with the protagonist's safety. Even when it 'evolves' or adapts to the supernatural environment, its new capabilities are used exclusively to serve and protect the humans. It facilitates the protagonist's growth by providing data and support without overriding her autonomy, ultimately helping her survive and then acting as a long-term digital guardian.
